name: Super Loaded Chili Potato Skins
author: HORMEL CHILI(R)
summary: Potato skins are baked until crisp, then filled with chili and cheese and topped with sour cream and chopped green onions.
ingredients: Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
1 (15 ounce) can HORMEL® Chili With Beans
directions: Pierce several times with tip of knife; arrange on large baking sheet
Slice each potato in half; scoop out flesh (reserve for mashing or potato pancakes), leaving 1/4-inch shell
Brush inside and outside of each potato half with oil; season with salt and pepper
Arrange potato halves on baking sheet
Bake 10 minutes, until crisp and golden brown, turning once
Spoon chili into potato shells; top with cheese
Bake 3 to 5 minutes or until cheese is melted
Top with sour cream and green onions
